appTitle.desc: Primary title of the App, displayed in App Bar

notificationTravellerAdded.desc: The notification that indicates the number of travellers added
notificationTravellerAdded.defaultMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no Travellers} one {# traveller} other {# travellers} } added

notificationTravellerRemoved.desc: The notification that indicates the number of travellers removed
notificationTravellerRemoved.defaultMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no travellers} one {# traveller} other {# travellers} } removed

notificationCriteriaRemoved.desc: The notification that indicates a criteria segments was removed
